creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund and the Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation; purchase from the Thomas Murray Collection
description: tall, thin bag divided into two decorative sections; top section with light and darker indigo vertical stripes, with white embroidered repeating pattern of diagonal lines intersecting into small star shapes; bottom section has textured, layered white embroidery, with same indigo striped pattern under embroidery; dark indigo square strips of cloth in bottom corners; lighter indigo woven strap attached to side of bag
markings: at top edge of bag, interior: Murray Collection label: JAP 6204
medium: Cloth: cotton; sashiko (decorative reinforcement stitching), indigo dye
title: Bag (fukuro) made in Aomori Prefecture
